Login.purpose: Secure authentication gateway for all users to access the APROFLEET BackOffice platform
Login.roleSpecific: Accessible to all roles with role-based credentials

Dashboard.purpose: Central hub providing overview of key metrics, quick actions, and recent activity
components: Statistics cards (Total/Active Vehicles, Maintenance Alerts, Tenants)
Quick actions panel for common tasks
Recent activity feed with real-time updates
Dashboard.roleSpecific: Super Admin sees all tenants; Golf Course Admin sees only their tenant data

Vehicles.purpose: Comprehensive fleet management interface for monitoring, tracking, and managing all vehicles
components: Advanced filter panel (status, type, battery, location)
Vehicle list table with sortable columns
Vehicle details modal with full specifications
Vehicles.roleSpecific: Super Admin sees all vehicles across tenants; Others see only assigned vehicles

Reservations.purpose: Manage vehicle bookings and reservations for golf course operations
Reservations.roleSpecific: Admin roles can create and manage; Viewers have read-only access

Maintenance.purpose: Comprehensive maintenance management system for tracking service requests and vehicle upkeep
components: Service requests tab with priority indicators
Maintenance.roleSpecific: Maintenance Staff can update tasks; Admins have full CRUD access

Analytics.purpose: Data visualization and reporting platform for fleet performance insights
Analytics.roleSpecific: All roles have read access; Admins can generate custom reports

Tenants.purpose: Manage multiple golf course clients in the multi-tenant SaaS architecture
components: Tenant cards grid with status indicators
Tenants.roleSpecific: Super Admin has full access; Manufacturer sees limited tenant data

Users.purpose: Manage user accounts, roles, permissions, and access control
components: User list table with role filters
Users.roleSpecific: Super Admin manages all users; Golf Course Admin manages tenant users only

Logs.purpose: Comprehensive system logging and monitoring interface for tracking application events
components: Service-specific log tabs (API, Database, Redis, etc.)
Log level filtering (Error, Warning, Info, Debug)
Logs.roleSpecific: Admin roles can access system logs; Limited access for other roles

API Documentation.purpose: Interactive API documentation and reference for developers
API Documentation.roleSpecific: Accessible to technical users and administrators for API integration

Settings.purpose: User-specific configuration for profile, display, notifications, and security
Settings.roleSpecific: All users can manage their own settings and preferences
